unnormalised: **Adaptive Learning Gains Traction in Indian Education Landscape**
normalised: **Adaptive Learning Gains Traction in Indian Education Landscape**

unnormalised: Mumbai, October 26, 2023 – Adaptive learning platforms are rapidly being adopted across India, promising personalized education experiences tailored to individual student needs. From the bustling classrooms of Delhi Public School to remote learning initiatives in rural Bihar, EdTech companies are leveraging AI to analyze student performance and adjust learning pathways accordingly.
normalised: Mumbai, october twenty six, two thousand and twenty three – Adaptive learning platforms are rapidly being adopted across India, promising personalized education experiences tailored to individual student needs. From the bustling classrooms of D-e-l-h-i Public School to remote learning initiatives in rural Bihar, E-d-T-e-c-h companies are leveraging A-I to analyze student performance and adjust learning pathways accordingly.

unnormalised: Leading the charge are platforms like "Shiksha Saathi," which adapt content based on real-time feedback, much like a skilled guru guiding a shishya. These systems identify knowledge gaps and provide targeted support, ensuring no student is left behind. IIT-Bombay researchers are currently conducting a study on the efficacy of adaptive learning in mathematics, with preliminary results showing significant improvements in student engagement and comprehension.
